00026 // lbann_optimizer_adagrad .hpp .cpp - Stochastic gradient descent optimizer with Adagrad
00027 //
00028 // Inspired by Kera.io implementation
00029 // Stochastic gradient descent with Adagrad.
00030 //  lr: float >= 0. Learning rate.
00031 //  epsilon: float >= 0.
00033 
00034 #include "lbann/optimizers/lbann_optimizer_adagrad.hpp"
00035 #include <sys/types.h>
00036 #include <unistd.h>
00037 #include <cmath>
00038 
00039 using namespace std;
00040 using namespace El;
00041 
00042 lbann::Adagrad_factory::Adagrad_factory(lbann_comm* comm, float lr, float epsilon)
00043   : comm(comm), lr(lr), epsilon(epsilon)
00044 {
00045 }
00046 
00047 lbann::Adagrad_factory::~Adagrad_factory()
00048 {
00049 }
00050 
00051 lbann::Optimizer *lbann::Adagrad_factory::create_optimizer(matrix_format format) {
00052   switch(format) {
00053   case matrix_format::MC_MR:
00054     return new Adagrad<DistMat>(this->comm, this->lr, this->epsilon);
00055   case matrix_format::CIRC_CIRC:
00056     return new Adagrad<CircMat>(this->comm, this->lr, this->epsilon);
00057   case matrix_format::STAR_STAR:
00058     return new Adagrad<StarMat>(this->comm, this->lr, this->epsilon);
00059   case matrix_format::STAR_VC:
00060     return new Adagrad<StarVCMat>(this->comm, this->lr, this->epsilon);
00061   default:
00062     // TODO: throw an exception
00063     printf("LBANN Error: unknown matrix distribution for Adagrad optimizer\n");
00064     exit(-1);
00065   }
00066 }
